title: Nanny to the Shifter
description: He needs a Nanny...and badly.. but he can barely pay for things as it stands...how will he be able to afford one?She desperately needs a job...but with her own child to care for now, how can she possibly get a job caring for another's child? Sometimes fate steps in and turns our biggest fears and weaknesses into our biggest strengths and opportunities...delivering us exactly who and what we need at just the right momentâ€¦but will this be one of those times? or will if just be another bitter disappointment for them both...?There is also a short preview of Dragon Protector included...This is a stand alone novella length Shifter romance with no cheating and an HEA.t is meant for mature 18+ readers.
author: Leela Ash
